name: Necklace
description: A beautiful necklace that adds elegance to any outfit. Crafted with exquisite details and fine materials, this necklace is perfect for special occasions or everyday wear.

name: Sofa
description: A comfortable and stylish sofa for your living room. This sofa features high-quality upholstery and a modern design, making it a perfect addition to your home.

name: Car
description: Experience the thrill of driving with our latest car model. With advanced features, safety technologies, and a powerful engine, this car offers an unmatched driving experience.

name: Wristwatch
description: An elegant wristwatch that combines style and functionality. This timepiece is perfect for any occasion and ensures you're always on time in style.

name: Television
description: Upgrade your home entertainment with our high-definition television. Enjoy crystal-clear images and immersive sound with this state-of-the-art TV.
